trans-unit.source: The <codeph>SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_GET_XPLAIN_MODE</codeph> function returns the current XPLAIN mode.

seg-source.mrk: The <codeph>SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_GET_XPLAIN_MODE</codeph> function returns the current XPLAIN mode.

target.mrk: The <codeph>SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_GET_XPLAIN_MODE</codeph> function returns the current XPLAIN mode.

trans-unit.source: If the XPLAIN mode is non-zero, then statements are not actually executed, but are just compiled, and their statistics recorded in the SYSXPLAIN_* database tables. If the XPLAIN mode is zero (the default), then statements are executed normally.

seg-source.mrk: If the XPLAIN mode is non-zero, then statements are not actually executed, but are just compiled, and their statistics recorded in the SYSXPLAIN_* database tables.
If the XPLAIN mode is zero (the default), then statements are executed normally.

target.mrk: If the XPLAIN mode is non-zero, then statements are not actually executed, but are just compiled, and their statistics recorded in the SYSXPLAIN_* database tables.
If the XPLAIN mode is zero (the default), then statements are executed normally.

trans-unit.source: See "Working with RunTimeStatistics" in <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/cittuning"></ph> for additional information.

seg-source.mrk: See "Working with RunTimeStatistics" in <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/cittuning"></ph> for additional information.

target.mrk: See "Working with RunTimeStatistics" in <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/cittuning"></ph> for additional information.

trans-unit.source: If authentication and SQL authorization are both enabled, only the <xref href="rrefattrib26867.dita#rrefattrib26867">database owner</xref> has execute privileges on this function by default. See "Enabling user authentication" and "Setting the SQL standard authorization mode" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph> for more information. The database owner can grant access to other users.

The database owner can grant access to other users.
